title: Türkiye Hackers Exploited Output Messenger Zero-Day to Drop Golang Backdoors on Kurdish Servers
summary:
A Türkiye-affiliated threat actor exploited a zero-day security flaw in an Indian enterprise communication platform called Output Messenger as part of a cyber espionage attack campaign since April 2024.
"These exploits have resulted in a collection of related user data from targets in Iraq," the Mic

title: ASUS DriverHub flaw let malicious sites run commands with admin rights
summary: The ASUS DriverHub driver management utility was vulnerable to a critical remote code execution flaw that allowed malicious sites to execute commands on devices with the software installed. [...]

title: Windows 11 upgrade block lifted after Safe Exam Browser fix
summary: Microsoft has removed an upgrade block that prevented some Safe Exam Browser users from installing the Windows 11 2024 Update due to incompatibility issues. [...]
